00027 struct ObjLoaderBase : public std::unary_function<std::istream&, WorldObject*>
00028 {
00029     virtual ~ObjLoaderBase(){}
00030     virtual WorldObject* operator()(std::istream& in) = 0;
00031 };
00032 
00034 template <typename _Type>
00035 struct ObjLoader : public ObjLoaderBase
00036 {
00037     virtual ~ObjLoader(){}
00038 
00039     virtual WorldObject* operator()(std::istream& in)
00040     {
00041         _Type* obj = new _Type;
00042         in >> *obj;
00043         return dynamic_cast<WorldObject*>(obj);
00044     }
00045 };
